categories: Category:Legends short stories from Star Wars Insider

nodes.text: "Hero of Cartao" was a serialized short story written by Timothy Zahn and illustrated by Douglas Chaffee that appeared in Star Wars Insider magazine. It was separated into three parts: "Hero's Call" (Issue 68), "Hero's Rise" (Issue 69), and "Hero's End" (Issue 70). It featured such characters as Jafer Torles and the pre-existing Zahn character of Kinman Doriana. It took place in 22 BBY and was essentially the story of how the Spaarti cloning cylinders came to Wayland.
It was printed in Star Wars: The Official Magazine 67 under the misspelled title of "Hero of Cartoa."
